moves.name: Confusion
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Troublemaker 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of success for status moves that inflict status conditions.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Once per battle, charges the user’s move gauge by two when the user is in a pinch.
